edu.harvard.cs262.GameClient

Interface GameClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleClient, UpdateableClient

    public interface GameClient
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A GameClient is a general interface allowing a client to receive messages from the server indicating which other slave servers exist in the distributed system.
    Version:
    1.0, April 2014
    Author:
    Twitch Plays Battleship Group

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPeer(java.util.UUID id, GameServer server)
      Add a new slave to the list of servers that this client can message.
      boolean getUpdatedPeers()
      Command this client to refresh its peer list by contacting the master.
      boolean removePeer(java.util.UUID id)
      Remove a slave from client's list of servers.
      boolean setPeers(java.util.Hashtable<java.util.UUID,GameServer> servers)
      Overwrite this client's list of slaves with an entirely new one.
